蔧字的基本解释

蔧
huì
〔王蔧〕古书上说的一种草，可制扫帚。

蔧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huì］
［《廣韻》徐醉切，去至，邪。］
(1)即地肤草。一年生草本植物。嫩苗可食，果实可药用。
(2)同“彗”。扫；拂。

蔧字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蔧； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1055第16
【集韻】旋芮切，音彗。草名。【爾雅·釋草】葥，王蔧。詳葥字註。　又【廣韻】徐醉切，音遂。義同。

蔧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蔧字的起名意思

王蔧，即"地肤"，俗称"扫帚菜"。一年生草本，多分枝，夏季开黄绿色小花。

蔧
Basic explanation of words
蔧
huì
[Wang Yan] A kind of grass in ancient books that can be used to make brooms.
蔧
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huì］
["Guang Yun" Xu Zui cut, go to the end, evil. ]
(1) Kochia scoparia. Annual herb. The tender seedlings are edible and the fruits are medicinal.
(2) Same as "come". Sweep; whisk.
蔧
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Characters] 　蔧; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1055-16
[Jiyun] Xuan Ruiqie, Yinhui. Cursive name. 【Erya·Shicao】Ting, Wang Yan. Detailed note of the word.　[Guangyun] Xu Zuiqie again, and the sound is complete. The same meaning.
蔧

Old glyph
蔧
Name meaning
Wang Su, namely "Kochia scoparia", commonly known as "broom dish". Annual herb, much branched, with yellow-green flowers in summer.
huì
только в сочетаниях; см. 王蔧
